settings.text: Healthier Skin. Organic and Chemical-Free Care.

settings.tab2_content:
A fully localized supply chain—100% made in Peru.
All our materials are sourced locally, and every stage of production is done within Peru. This not only minimizes our environmental impact, but also ensures full traceability.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
Step-by-step guide:

  • Start at the ends of dry or damp hair.
  • Gently work your way up toward the roots.
  • Rinse and air‑dry the comb after each use.

Key Benefits:

  • Effortless Detangling: Wide teeth glide through all hair types without snags
  • Frizz & Static Control: Smooth material reduces flyaways and split ends
  • Scalp Stimulation: Rounded tips boost blood flow for stronger, healthier growth
  • Zero‑Waste: Fully compostable and biodegradable; end‑of‑life care couldn’t be simpler."

settings.custom_liquid:
<script>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    const accordions = document.querySelectorAll('collapsible-row details');

    accordions.forEach((accordion) => {
      accordion.addEventListener('toggle', function () {
        if (this.open) {
          accordions.forEach((other) => {
            if (other !== this && other.open) {
              other.removeAttribute('open');
            }
          });
        }
      });
    });
  });
</script>
<style>
 .subheading{
margin-bottom:5px}

 @media screen and (max-width: 768px) {
.accordion__content {
      margin-right: 2px !important;
    }
 .image-with-text__content h3 {
      font-size: 22px !important;
    }
.accordion__content {
    padding-right:20px !important;
  }
.image-with-text__content h3 {
      font-size: 22px !important;
      width: 100%;
      display: block;
     
    }

   .image-with-text__content {
      padding-left: 0 !important;
      padding-right: 0 !important;
      width: 100% !important;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }
.image-with-text {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column-reverse!important;
    }
    .image-with-text__content--inner {
      width: 100% !important;
    }
#section1 .image-with-text__content {
margin:0px!important;}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
  #section1 .image-with-text, #section2 .image-with-text, #section4 .image-with-text, #section6 .image-with-text,  .image-with-text {
    padding-top:2.5%!important;padding-bottom:2.5%!important;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {
 #section2 .image-with-text, #section4 .image-with-text, #section6 .image-with-text,  .image-with-text {
    padding-bottom: 8%!important;
  }
}
</style>

settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.heading: Sustainable Beauty in Action: Your Choice for a Cleaner Planet
Community Care: Supporting Local Traditions
settings.content:
Our products are crafted by skilled artisans using ancestral techniques that have been passed down through generations.

What makes it ethical?

  • Ancestral Craftsmanship: Passed down through generations, preserving cultural heritage and traditional techniques
  • Community Empowerment: Replanting bamboo creates stable, long-term jobs for local communities, supporting their economic growth.

custom_css: @media screen and (max-width: 768px) {.image-with-text {display: flex; flex-direction: column-reverse !important; padding-bottom: 8%; }}
img_and_text_prod_section1_HwC4zB.name: Img&Text-prod-section1

settings.text: Sustainable Luxury for Your Home and Health

Our curated collection deﬁnes a new kind of luxury—one rooted in authenticity, environmental responsibility, and cultural heritage.
What makes our collection unique:

  • Handcrafted origin:
    Each item is made by Peruvian artisans using traditional methods.
  • Natural materials:
    We work exclusively with organic and biodegradable resources.
  • Cultural celebration:
    Designs are inspired by Amazonian biodiversity and pre-Hispanic symbolism.
  • Ethical commitment:
    Every purchase helps preserve indigenous knowledge and promotes fair trade practices.

Discover beauty, innovation, and integrity—woven into every detail.
